title: Lucky
lyrics:
[intro] (C)  (Am)  (F)  (G)  (E)  (Am)  (F)  (G)
[him] Now do you (C)hear me talking to (Am)you
Across the (F)water, across the (G)deep --  blue -- (E)ocean
Under the (Am)open sky, oh (F)my baby I'm (G)trying
[her] Boy I (C)hear you in my (Am)dreams
I feel your (F)whisper across the (G)sea      
I keep you (E)with me in my (Am)heart              
You make it (F)easier when (G)life gets hard
(Am) Lucky I'm in (Dm7) love with my best friend
(G) Lucky to have (C) been where (C/B)I have been
(Am) Lucky to be (Dm7)coming home a(G)gain  
(C)Ooh ooh-oooooh (Em)ooh-ooooooh....
[bridge]                                
[her] (Dm7)They don't know how long it takes
                          ([him] They don't know how long it takes)           
[both] (G) Waiting for a love like this                                           
[her] (F)Every time we say goodbye
             ([him] Every time we say goodbye)
[both] (G) I wish we had one more kiss
[both] I'll (Dm7)wait for you, I promise you, I (G)willâ€¦..
[chorus, both]
(Am) Lucky I'm in (Dm7) love with my best friend
(G) Lucky to have (C) been where (C/B)I have been
(Am) Lucky to be (Dm7)coming home a(G)gain  
(Am) Lucky we're in (Dm7) love in every way
(G) Lucky to have (C) stayed where (C/B)we have stayed
(Am) Lucky to be (Dm7)coming home some (G) day
[him] And so I'm (C)sailing, through the (Am) sea
To an (F)island, where we'll (G)meet     
You'll hear the (E)music, fill the (Am)air            
I put a (F)flower (G)in your hair
[her] And though the (C)breezes through the (Am)trees
You move so (F)pretty, you're all I (G)see       
As the (E)world keeps spinning (Am)round           
You (F)hold me right (G)here, right now
[chorus, both]
(Am) Lucky I'm in (Dm7) love with my best friend
(G) Lucky to have (C) been where (C/B)I have been
(Am) Lucky to be (Dm7)coming home a(G)gain  
(Am) Lucky we're in (Dm7) love in every way
(G) Lucky to have (C) stayed where (C/B)we have stayed
(Am) Lucky to be (Dm7)coming home some (G)day
(C)Ooh ooh-oooooh (Em)ooh-ooooooh....
(C)Ooh ooh-oooooh (Em)ooh-ooooooh.... (C-single strum) [end]
